code: import React,{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Login(){const nav=useNavigate();const[password,setPassword]=useState();const[email,setEmail]=useState();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const res=await axios.post('/api/v1/auth/login',{email,password});console.log(res.data.user.role);if(res&&res.data.success){window.alert(res.data.message);nav('/dashboard',{state:res.data.user});}else if(res.data.success==false){window.alert(res.data.message);}}catch(error){window.alert("Login Failed");}};const toRegiser=()=>{nav('/');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("form",{action:"",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"register",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"informations",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"",children:"E-mail"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),name:"email",placeholder:"Your Email",title:"Your Email",type:"email"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"",children:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),type:"password",placeholder:"Password"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"",children:"Phone"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"create",children:"Login"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{onClick:toRegiser,className:"return-store",children:"Go To Register"})]});}export default Login;
